hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Your privacy matters to us. We're committed to protecting your personal information with care, faith, and sincerity.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.body: Welcome to Jodohmu. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our services.

items.profile: Profile information including photos, bio, and preferences

items.interactions: How you interact with our platform

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.description: We use your personal information to:

items.service: Provide and maintain our matchmaking service
items.safety: Ensure platform safety and prevent fraud
items.improvements: Improve our services and user experience

sharing.title: Data Sharing & Third Parties
sharing.description: We may share your information with trusted partners to help operate and protect our platform:

firebase.title: Firebase/Google
firebase.description: Our database and authentication services are hosted on Firebase. Google acts as our data processor and stores information on our behalf.

providers.title: Service Providers
providers.description: Verified third-party partners who assist with infrastructure, analytics, and customer support

legal.title: Legal Authorities
legal.description: When required by law or to protect our rights, safety, or other users

sharing.note: We never sell your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

security.title: How We Protect Your Data
security.description: We implement technical and organizational measures to secure your personal data, including:

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: Subject to applicable law, you have the right to:

items.access: Access the personal data we hold about you
items.delete: Request deletion of your account and data
items.object: Object to or restrict certain processing
items.portability: Request a copy of your data in a portable format
items.withdraw: Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.description: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary to provide our services and meet legal obligations. When you delete your account, we remove profile information within 30 days unless we must retain it for legal reasons.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.description: Jodohmu is intended for users 18 years and older. We do not knowingly collect information from minors and will delete any such data immediately if discovered.

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.description: Your information may be processed outside Indonesia. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data in accordance with applicable laws.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.description: We may update this policy from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated via email or in-app notifications, and the updated policy will always be available here.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this policy or your data, reach out to us:

hero.title: Terms and Conditions
hero.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully. By using Jodohmu, you agree to honor these commitments rooted in respect, safety, and sincerity.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.body: By accessing and using Jodohmu, you agree to be bound by these terms and any additional guidelines we provide. If you cannot agree, please refrain from using our services.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.body: You must be at least 18 years old and capable of entering into a binding agreement to create an account. By registering, you confirm that you meet these requirements.

important.label: Important:
important.body: Providing false age information is a violation of these terms and may result in immediate account termination and possible legal action.

registration.title: Registration Requirements
registration.body: Provide accurate and complete information when creating your account. Keep your profile details up to date so we can offer the best experience.

items.responsibility: You are responsible for all activity that occurs under your account.
items.notify: Notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorized access or misuse.
items.liability: We are not liable for losses arising from unauthorized access caused by your actions.
items.sharing: Do not share your login credentials with anyone.

conduct.title: User Conduct & Prohibited Activities
conduct.description: Help us nurture a respectful community by following these guidelines and avoiding prohibited activity.

items.falseInfo: Posting false, misleading, or deceptive information.
items.inappropriate: Uploading offensive, obscene, or unlawful content.
items.explicit: Sharing explicit or sexually suggestive material.

items.harassment: Harassing, bullying, or threatening other users.
items.spam: Spamming or sending unsolicited commercial messages.
items.personalInfo: Attempting to obtain personal information from other users.
items.illegal: Engaging in or encouraging illegal activities.

items.photos: Use recent photos that clearly represent you.
items.bio: Ensure your bio and details are honest and accurate.
items.contactInfo: Do not share contact information publicly.
items.promotions: Avoid watermarks, advertisements, or promotional content.

removal.title: Content Removal
removal.body: We reserve the right to remove any content violating these guidelines without prior notice. Repeated violations may result in suspension or account closure.

your.title: Your Content
your.body: You retain ownership of the content you submit. By posting, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to display and distribute your content to operate the service.

platform.title: Platform Content
platform.body: All Jodohmu trademarks, designs, and technology are protected by law. Do not use them without written permission.

guarantees.title: No Guarantees
guarantees.body: Jodohmu does not guarantee that you will find a match, relationship, or life partner through the service.

safety.title: Meeting Safety
safety.body: You are responsible for your safety during in-person meetings. Meet in public places and inform someone you trust of your plans.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.body: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Jodohmu is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from your use of our services.

voluntary.title: Voluntary Termination
voluntary.body: You may delete your account at any time through your settings. We will remove your profile within 30 days, consistent with our Privacy Policy.

byJodohmu.title: Termination by Jodohmu
byJodohmu.body: We may suspend or terminate your account immediately for violations of these terms, illegal activity, or actions that put our community at risk.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We may modify these terms at any time. Updated terms will be posted here with the revised date noted above.
changes.notification: For significant updates, we will notify you via email or in-app messaging. Continuing to use Jodohmu after changes means you accept the new terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

governing.body: These terms are governed by the laws of Indonesia without regard to conflict-of-law principles.

dispute.title: Dispute Resolution
dispute.body: Disputes will first be addressed through good-faith negotiations. If unresolved, they will be submitted to arbitration in Bandung, Indonesia.
